note: This script can have multiple night deaths.
This script can have failed executions.
This script has alternate win/loss conditions.
This script is for confirmed/expert players and Storytellers.

error: Less than 11 characters. Script can not be used for Teensyville games.
Heretic, Damsel, and Choirboy don't work with characters that can see the Grimoire.
Lil' Monsta and Alchemist require at least 5 Minions on the script, for base 3 Minions games
If the Goon is picked by the Lleech, the Demon becomes invincible.

warning: More than 25 characters. May cause issues with visibility.
Fewer than 4 outsiders.
Fewer than 4 minions.
More than one character that can bring/become an extra evil.
Only one character that causes extra night deaths.
Only one character that causes failed executions.
Only one character that causes resurrection.
Only one character that explains no night deaths. (protection or lack of killing)
Extra night deaths without any protection roles.
No Quiet Minions. Quiet Minions can't be confirmed until the game ends.
No hidden Outsiders or reason for the Outsiders to hide.
No reason to distrust night deaths.
No evil-aligned droison characters.
No evil-aligned reasons to survive executions.
Leviathan doesn't pair well with good-aligned droison characters.
Bad/Powerful Minions choices for the Alchemist.
King with no Choirboy.
Damsel with no Huntsman.
Virgin is a hard-confirmed character.
Good-aligned targeted killing roles are dangerous for a Lleech.
The Heretic can change alignment and win with Evil.
The Leviathan and Pukka cannot kill themselves in case of a Heretic.
Certain characters cannot be stormcaught.
Saint cannot be executed for the Godfather.
Fearmonger announcements mid-game can confirm a role change character or a Preacher.
The Mezepheles may be resurrected, causing another player to become evil.
Damsel, Heretic, Choirboy, and Magician cannot be the Good Twin.
Known Minions like Psychopath and Vizier can pollute Town Crier information.
A good player can vote on every execution for the Vizier and be converted later in the game.
Scripts that have up to 3 extra Outsiders require 5 or more Outsiders.
The Minstrel has bad interactions with one or more Minions.
Vigormortis killed Poisoner in a Poppy Grower game may poison the Vigormortis, creating an infinite poison loop.
The Marionette cannot "think" they are the Lunatic.
The Marionette cannot be the Damsel added by the Huntsman.
The Marionette cannot be the King added by the Choirboy
